explains: v. 使转向，使绕道；分散，转移；娱乐，供消遣；转接（电话）；改变（资金、材料等）的用途
wordGroup: divert attention from 把注意力从…转移开来；分散注意力

sentences.en: Even using a "hands-free" device can divert a driver's attention to an alarming extent.
sentences.cn: 即使使用“免提”设备，也会在令人担忧的程度上转移司机的注意力。

sentences.en: It works in compression to divert the weight above it out to the sides, where the weight is borne by the vertical elements on either side of the arch.
sentences.cn: 在受到压力时，拱形结构能够起到将其上面的压力转移到侧面，在侧面的重量则由拱形结构两侧的垂直部分来承受。

sentences.en: When they detect an extended dry period, they divert their metabolisms, producing sugars and certain stress-associated proteins and other materials in their tissues.
sentences.cn: 当它们发现干旱期延长时，它们会转移自己的新陈代谢，在它们的组织中产生糖和某些与压力相关的蛋白质和其他物质。
